titles.title: ROBERT MALLEY Act
Requiring Officials and Bureaucrats to Expeditiously Reliquinsh Testimony and Meaningful Answers about Lawbreaking and Locked out Employees Yesterday Act
ROBERT MALLEY Act

To require heads of executive agencies to, upon request, submit to relevant congressional committees information regarding the furlough or indefinite suspension without pay of employees of such executive agencies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.
